You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &supset;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Supset;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22d1/index.htm U+022D1].
  * `&supset;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2283/index.htm U+02283].
